data.what_is:
Campaign Manager is a customer experience orchestration platform that enables Adaptive Marketers(tm) to automate a consistently relevant Adaptive Customer Experience(tm) by simultaneously utilizing the latest state of each customer relationship across multiple campaigns and channels.

As part of the Chameleon(tm) platform, Campaign Manager orchestrates a fully contextual experience through Omnichannel marketing automation delivering response driven personalization. This is underpinned by unprecedented access to the data and 'Insights' capability, enabling the marketer to access the full extent of each customer relationship in a matter of seconds with real-time campaign and customer analytics.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Alterian Real-Time CX Platform:
review_question_answers.answer: I think if you are a new business, spend a little extra in the beginning to find the right market and leverage their campaigns and analytics to help you expand your business. Their marketing team has a lot of knowledge and really know what their doing.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Alterian Real-Time CX Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Alterian is a one stop shop for any business to really dive in to your target market and using data analytics that they provide to understand my customer and ultimately build my business.

Recommendations to others considering Alterian Real-Time CX Platform:
Try it out!! It's worth it.
